CustomField.description: When enabled, the framework uses a highly scalable, event-driven architecture for background processing. This is recommended for orgs with high user concurrency or heavy asynchronous job usage to ensure responsive performance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this to switch to a high-throughput processing mode using Platform Events. This avoids potential delays from the standard async job queue and is ideal for large-scale deployments.
CustomField.label: Enable Scalable Processing Mode
